knownrelatives: Neith (Gaea, grandmother); Nun (Demiurge, grandfather); Ammon-Ra (Atum, father); Amaunet (mother), Mut (stepmother), Montu (brother), Rat-Tauit (sister-in-law), Bast (Panther God, half-brother); Bes, Ptah (possible brothers), extended family
powers: Khonshu possesses various mystical abilities, including the power to raise the dead. He has formerly acted on Earth through the body of his servant Marc Spector, sometimes inhabiting his physical form and granting him superhuman strenght. He can appear to Spector as illusions, asuming other peoples forms. He is also able to teleport.
